original: 原為江夏士兵，於中平三年聚眾起事，殺害南陽太守秦頡，陸續攻陷六縣，最終被時任荊州刺史的王敏與繼任南陽太守的羊續討伐。
text: Formerly a soldier of Jiangxia, gathered in Zhongping in the third year, and killed Qin Jie, the prefect of Nanyang, and captured six counties. Finally, Wang Min, the governor of Jingzhou at the time, and the sheep who succeeded the prefect of Nanyang continued their crusade.
